path: artifacts/Passive Income Bot Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

project_path.Passive_Income_Bot: contracts/Passive Income Bot Audit Report - QuillAudits/Passive_Income_Bot

findings.title: Compiler version not fixed
findings.description: Solidity source files indicate the versions of the compiler they can be compiled with.

findings.title: Coding Style Issues
findings.description: Influences code readability and in some cases may lead to bugs in future.

findings.title: Naming convention issues – Variables, Structs, Functions
findings.description: It is recommended to follow all solidity naming conventions to maintain readability of code.

findings.title: _total should be a constant
findings.description: As per the ERC-20 token standards, the total supply should be fixed.

findings.title: Approve function of ERC-20 is vulnerable (Informational)
findings.description: A security issue called “Multiple Withdrawal Attack” - originates from two methods in the ERC20 standard for approving and transferring tokens.
